Name: Lynette
Title: "Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette
Desc: The firmament glimpsed in a reflected moon.
Source: Reward for inviting Lynette to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

15082.Name: Enigmatic Feint
15082.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. The first time this Skill is used this Round, heal the character for 2 HP if they have no more than 8 HP, but apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115081]</color> to said character.

C115081.Name: Overawing Assault
C115081.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If this character's HP is at least 6, then they will take 2 $[K5].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 1</color>

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

C115082.Name: Bogglecat Box
C115082.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K105].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your active character takes DMG:</color> Decreases DMG taken by 1. (Once per Round)
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character(s) take {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> DMG:</color> Change the Elemental Type of this card to the element of the damage taken. (Once before leaving play)

K105.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>
K105.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
